CLAUDE.md - massSight R Package Guide

Source: CLAUDE.md

Commands

  • Install: devtools::install()
  • Document: devtools::document()
  • Check: devtools::check()
  • Run all tests: devtools::test() or testthat::test_package("massSight")
  • Run specific test file: testthat::test_file("tests/testthat/test-file.R")
  • Run filtered tests: devtools::test(filter="test_name")
  • Lint package: lintr::lint_package()
  • Lint file: lintr::lint("R/filename.R")

Style Guidelines

  • Structure: Standard R package with roxygen2 documentation
  • Classes: S4 system (MSObject, MergedMSObject)
  • Naming: Functions use snake_case, classes use PascalCase
  • Indentation: 2 spaces as defined in .Rproj
  • Imports: Use explicit namespace qualification with ::
  • Parameters: Validate with checkmate package
  • Errors: Use stopifnot() with informative messages
  • Documentation: Use roxygen2 with markdown
  • Testing: Use testthat package with descriptive expectations
  • Features: C++ integration with Rcpp, pipe operator with magrittr

On this page
